title: GE Soldier Pack: Infantry Assault
description: This Soldier pack includes an Assault Soldier Specialist, the absolute best for leading an assault in any combat situation. Leading an assault can be dangerous and flanking routes are needed. One of the vehicles included in this pack is a mobile spawn vehicle.
longDescription:
This Soldier pack includes an Assault Soldier Specialist, the absolute best for leading an assault in any combat situation. Leading an assault can be dangerous and flanking routes are needed. One of the vehicles included in this pack is a mobile spawn vehicle.

# Contents
- Soldier
- Sturmgewehr 44
- Pistol C96
- Seitengewehr 98
- Stielhandgranate 24
- Blitz Truck
- Kübelwagen typ 82
- GE First Aid Kit
- 30 day Veteran Membership
- 3 x Sturmgewehr 44 Specialist Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Chauffeur Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Physical Training Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Medic Ribbon Booster

# Sturmgewehr 44
The StG44 is a fantastic weapon, the range of a rifle, the firepower of an SMG, and damage in between. With enough of these, we can conquer the world! 30 round magazine, great handling and stopping power, makes it a joy to use.

# Pistol C96
The C96 is the world's first effective semi-automatic handgun. When kept clean and well-oiled it is an effective handgun with a very good effective range.

# Seitengewehr 98
Also known as the bayonet/fighting knife 98k, no matter what you call it, it is an effective fighting knife as well as a tool knife. If you can get close enough to your target it is a silent and effective killer.

# Stielhandgranate 24
The standard German hand grenade. Twist the cap, pull the glass bead and throw. An experienced soldier can throw it 35-40 meters.

# Blitz Truck
The backbone of the German infantry is a truck that can quickly move troops and equipment, and deploy them anywhere on the battlefield. Because it is unprotected, it should not be taken too close to the enemy.

# Kübelwagen typ 82
The ‘bucket automobile’ is a light multi-role armored car. It is robust and well-liked by German infantry for whom it serves as fast transportation. It is armed with a single 7.92mm MG34 machinegun for defence.

# German First Aid Kit
The first aid kit is a package of bandage carried by the soldier intended for immediate use if he is wounded. The first aid kit can be used to treat the soldiers own wounds as well as his friends.

# Veteran Membership
Progress faster and earn more Credits and Warfunds!

# Ribbon Boosters
Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.
